metadata.title: ORUS Gallery | Contemporary Art | Taiwan
metadata.description: ORUS Gallery represents international contemporary artists for Asian and global collectors. Origin + Us: where art meets identity.

mission.label: Mission
mission.text1: Connecting international contemporary artists with Asian and global collectors.
mission.text2: Taiwan as strategic entry point — a growing market with deep institutional and collector infrastructure.
mission.text3: Structured diffusion through exhibitions, private sales, and targeted fairs.

partnerships.label: Partnerships
partnerships.description: ORUS Gallery works with institutions, corporate collectors, and private clients seeking structured access to contemporary art. We facilitate long-term relationships grounded in curatorial integrity and market knowledge.

statement.text: ORUS is Origin + Us. We bridge international contemporary artists with Asian and global collectors who understand that a collection is built over a lifetime, not a season. Limited roster. Long-term careers over hype. Deep support: documentation, process, placement, discretion. We operate by appointment and respond within 24 hours.
